column5: Does anyone know if the parking lot for the Whitby public launch usually fills up on the weekend?  Or, is there usually parking available even on a weekend with not too much wind?

I haven't been in years but I recall it wasn't a huge lot.  If it's a nice forecast then you are taking chances as it may fill up quick JB.  Also keep that extra few min for the Shawa as a back up plan.  Good luck
you'll have space to park, its a pretty decent sized lot now
Yup, big lot, no worries.  S.
